ISSUE.TITLE: Throw error when search billing email address into order list page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.4.2 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Open admin side and go to order list page 2. Search billing email address ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10364140/112097424-fd55aa00-8bc5-11eb-828e-063cdae86791.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5586 Using of Autofac above the internal DI (cherry picked from commit 206d120c0ccfd8b9c2c78235e19204facb4e5852)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5561 Fixed searching problem on the order list page
